column2: Run seed-based correlation analysis. Must have defined roiSpecificationFileForSCA and maskSpecificationFileForSCA.
column3: A list where ‘1’ represents ‘yes’ and ‘0’ represents ‘no’ (e.g., ‘[1]’).

column2: A list of paths to ROI masks.
column3: Denote which analyses to run for each ROI path by listing 1s or 0s.  For example, if you wish to run Avg and MultReg, you would enter: '/path/to/ROI.nii.gz': 1,0,1

column2: Normalize time series before running dual regression.
